sentences.sentence: He could never be called an old Moustache Pete and he had the confidence of the newer, younger, brasher leaders on their way up.
sentences.translation: 他绝不应称之为老朽：他深受新冒出来的比较年轻、比较活跃、正蒸蒸日上的领袖人物的信任。

sentences.sentence: This, along with several related studies from the same period, contrasts with some of the artists' brasher pictures, which teem with life and activity.
sentences.translation: 这和同一时期的几个相关研究与一些艺术家表现生命和活力的仓促之作形成了对比。
